LanguageData.RE_ColonialWoodTile.label: colonial wood floor
LanguageData.RE_ColonialWoodTile.description: Wood plank flooring for that warm, homey feeling. While it is quick to lay, it is also very flammable.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileSteel.label: steel colonial floor
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileSteel.description: Steel tiles, for that spaceship look. They are pretty, and the smooth tile surface gets a bonus to cleanliness.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileSilver.label: silver colonial floor
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileSilver.description: For a futuristic but royal look, silver tiles fit perfectly into luxurious rooms. They get a bonus to cleanliness.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileGold.label: gold colonial floor
LanguageData.RE_ColonialFloorTileGold.description: For overbearing extravagance, nothing beats gold tiles. They are exceptionally expensive, and exceptionally beautiful, and people will think you're exceptionally snobbish if you actually live on them.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialRubberTile.label: colonial rubber floor
LanguageData.RE_ColonialRubberTile.description: Colonial rubber floor, fast to build and reducing the risk of dangerous accidents.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileSteel.label: steel colonial pavement tile
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileSteel.description: Steel tiles. Cheap, but neutral in terms of looks and fast to build.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileSilver.label: silver colonial pavement tile
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileSilver.descriptio: Silver tiles. Cheap, quite beautiful in terms of looks and fast to build.
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileGold.label: gold colonial pavement tile
LanguageData.RE_ColonialPavementTileGold.description: Gold tiles. Cheap, beautiful in terms of looks and fast to build.
